value.name: Police arrest man for alleged possession of child pornography
value.description: El Paso police arrested 19-year-old Frank James fuller after officers reportedly seized over 15000 images of child pornography. Police said on May 13th, detectives with the El Paso Police Department along with Homeland Security Investigations conducted search warrants on two apartments at 5249 Wren Ave.

value.name: El Paso man, 19, arrested after investigators say they found 1,500 images of child porn
value.description: A 19-year-old man was arrested after law enforcement investigators found more than 1,500 images of child porn on his digital devices, police said.

value.name: Ross Perot Dies At 89
value.description: Ross Perot, the billionaire tycoon who mounted two unsuccessful third-party presidential campaigns in the 1990s, died Tuesday, family spokesman James Fuller confirmed to CNN. He was 89.

value.name: Elgin issues proclamations condemning racism, praising police
value.description: Coming on the same week as the anniversary of the murder of George Floyd, Elgin City Council members spoke out against racism and discrimination and in support of local police. The statements came in the form of proclamations approved Wednesday night.
